data.comment: The big names in today's match at Estadio Olimpico Universitario have now been confirmed.
The whistle has gone to start the match.
In the minute 2, Corner awarded to Cruz Azul.
Free kick for Pumas UNAM in their own half.
Pumas UNAM have been awarded a corner by Cesar Arturo Ramos.
In the minute 4, Goal! Juan Dinenno gives Pumas UNAM a 1-0 lead in Mexico City.
Cruz Azul awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Pumas UNAM at Estadio Olimpico Universitario.
In the minute 7, In Mexico City a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Pumas UNAM awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Pumas UNAM in the half of Cruz Azul.
In the minute 10, Cruz Azul will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Pumas UNAM.
Cruz Azul are in shooting range from this free kick.
Cesar Arturo Ramos awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 14, Cesar Arturo Ramos signals a free kick to Cruz Azul in their own half.
Cesar Arturo Ramos signals a free kick to Pumas UNAM.
Throw-in Cruz Azul.
In the minute 17, Can Cruz Azul get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Pumas UNAM's half?
Can Cruz Azul capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Pumas UNAM's half?
Free kick Pumas UNAM.
In the minute 19, Play has been interrupted briefly in Mexico City to check on Pablo Aguilar, who is grimacing with pain.
Cesar Arturo Ramos signals a free kick to Cruz Azul in their own half.
Pumas UNAM awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 21, Ball safe as Pumas UNAM is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Cruz Azul's Pablo Aguilar is back in action after a slight knock.
Throw-in for Pumas UNAM in their own half.
In the minute 24, Cruz Azul have been awarded a corner by Cesar Arturo Ramos.
Free kick for Pumas UNAM in their own half.
Cesar Arturo Ramos signals a free kick to Cruz Azul.
In the minute 25, Corner awarded to Cruz Azul.
Cruz Azul's Juan Escobar has run offside.
Cesar Arturo Ramos awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 29, Free kick Cruz Azul.
Throw-in Pumas UNAM.
Roberto Alvarado (Cruz Azul) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 32, Cesar Arturo Ramos signals a Pumas UNAM throw-in in Cruz Azul's half.
Goal kick for Cruz Azul at Estadio Olimpico Universitario.
Ball safe as Pumas UNAM is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 36, Pumas UNAM have been awarded a corner by Cesar Arturo Ramos.
Juan Dinenno puts the ball in the net and the home team extend their lead. The score-line now reads 2-0.
Throw-in for Cruz Azul at Estadio Olimpico Universitario.
In the minute 41, Cruz Azul awarded a throw-in in their own half.
It's now 3-0 in Mexico City as Carlos Gonzalez scores for Pumas UNAM.
Throw-in for Pumas UNAM in their own half.
In the minute 43, Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Juan Vigon for Pumas UNAM who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Juan Vigon has recovered and rejoins the match in Mexico City.
Corner awarded to Pumas UNAM.
In the minute 44, Cruz Azul awarded a free kick in their own half.
Cruz Azul to take a throw-in in Pumas UNAM territory.
Free kick for Pumas UNAM in their own half.
In the minute 45, Pumas UNAM pushes forward through Carlos Gonzalez, whose finish on goal is saved.
Cesar Arturo Ramos awards the away team a throw-in.
Jonathan Rodriguez of Cruz Azul smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 45, Cesar Arturo Ramos signals a free kick to Pumas UNAM in their own half.
Cesar Arturo Ramos blows to end the first-half.
The second-half has just kicked-off.
In the minute 46, Pumas UNAM awarded a free kick in their own half.
The match at Estadio Olimpico Universitario has been interrupted briefly for a check on Alejandro Mayorga, who is down injured.
Pumas UNAMâ€™s Alejandro Mayorga is on his feet again at Estadio Olimpico Universitario.
Pumas UNAM have a goal kick.
In the minute 50, It seems as if Alejandro Mayorga is unable to continue. Jero Rodriguez replaces him for the home team.
Ball safe as Cruz Azul is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 52, It's a goal kick for the home team in Mexico City.
Free kick for Cruz Azul in the half of Pumas UNAM.
In Mexico City Cruz Azul attack through Juan Escobar. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 53, Ball goes out of play for a Pumas UNAM goal kick.
Pumas UNAM are pushing forward but Carlos Gonzalez's finish is wide of the goal.
Cesar Arturo Ramos awards Cruz Azul a goal kick.
In the minute 54, In Mexico City a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Goal kick for Pumas UNAM at Estadio Olimpico Universitario.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 56, Free kick Cruz Azul.
Throw-in for Cruz Azul in the half of Pumas UNAM.
Pumas UNAM push forward at Estadio Olimpico Universitario and Juan Vigon gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Cruz Azul defence.
In the minute 61, Corner awarded to Pumas UNAM.
Throw-in Cruz Azul.
Throw-in for Cruz Azul at Estadio Olimpico Universitario.
In the minute 64, Cruz Azul awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Pumas UNAM in their own half.
The away team have replaced Roberto Alvarado with Yoshimar Yotun. This is the first substitution made today by Robert Siboldi.
In the minute 65, Free kick in a good position for Cruz Azul!
Juan Iturbe (Pumas UNAM) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Ignacio Rivero for Cruz Azul gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 66, Pumas UNAM have a goal kick.
Cesar Arturo Ramos signals a free kick to Cruz Azul in their own half.
Juan Vigon for Pumas UNAM has been booked by Cesar Arturo Ramos and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 69, Cruz Azul's Juan Escobar gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Cesar Arturo Ramos awards Pumas UNAM a goal kick.
Orbelin Pineda is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Orbelin Pineda is back on his feet again.
In the minute 71, The home team replace Leonel Lopez with Facundo Waller.
Throw-in for Cruz Azul in their own half.
In the minute 74, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Pumas UNAM awarded a free kick in their own half.
Cesar Arturo Ramos signals a Pumas UNAM throw-in in Cruz Azul's half.
In the minute 76, Sebastian Saucedo is replacing Juan Iturbe for Pumas UNAM at Estadio Olimpico Universitario.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Mexico City.
Cesar Arturo Ramos signals a free kick to Pumas UNAM.
In the minute 80, Cesar Arturo Ramos signals a throw-in for Cruz Azul, close to Pumas UNAM's area.
Cruz Azul have been awarded a corner by Cesar Arturo Ramos.
Throw-in for Pumas UNAM in the half of Cruz Azul.
In the minute 82, Cesar Arturo Ramos awards the away team a throw-in.
Ball goes out of play for a Cruz Azul goal kick.
Goal kick for Pumas UNAM at Estadio Olimpico Universitario.
In the minute 89, Great finish from Juan Vigon to give Pumas UNAM a 4-0 lead.
Can Cruz Azul get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Pumas UNAM's half?
Cruz Azul to take a throw-in in Pumas UNAM territory.
Cruz Azul awarded a throw-in in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Mexico City.
5 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Throw-in Cruz Azul.
Free kick for Cruz Azul in their own half.
Ball safe as Pumas UNAM is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Cruz Azul in the half of Pumas UNAM.
Full-time! The final score is 4-0.
Robert Siboldi is making the team's second substitution at Estadio Olimpico Universitario with Santiago Gimenez replacing Jose Martinez.
